inicio.menciona:
Hi! Type `.ahelp` or `.ah` to see the command menu :D
_Você pode alterar meu idioma para português com o comando `.alang pt`_
inicio.cooldown: seconds to run this command again.
inicio.error_1: Wrrrooong, the correct use of the command is
inicio.epic_embed_fail: An error occurred while trying to execute this command, I warned the team to eliminate this baidu as soon as possible. apologies for the inconvenience

diversao.aviso_1:
Tag two people to test
For example, `.alove @Alonsal @Slondo`

diversao.error_2: get out of here your CAT :cow: TLE, test it with another user

diversao.aviso_1: Enter something in addition to this command, for example `.ana alonsal > odnols`
diversao.sorte: There was a repetition of words! Lucky you?

diversao.nsfw_jaja: Due to the excess of delight, this command can only be used on an NSFW channel.

diversao.aviso_1:
Write something for this command
For example, `.asans slomdo very cringerrr afff`

diversao.rodape: pages, use .ar <num> to see other pages
diversao.rodape_rc: pages, use .arc <num> to see other pages
diversao.paginas: Enter a lower number for the page
diversao.historia_alonsal: These are the commands activated throughout the history of Alonsal
diversao.error_rc: Could not load command rating at this time, please try again later

jogos.conteudo:
The 1st Game created by SLondo!
How far can you run? Test now!
jogos.rodape: The game may not run properly on mobile phones.

jogos.aviso_1: Enter heads or tails as `.aco heads` or `.aco tails` to test your luck!
Enter **numbers only** for the amount of dice and number of faces
jogos.aviso_2: Enter at least 1 die as `.ada 1 <faces>` to be able to run.
jogos.error_1: It is not possible to take more than 50 dice at the same time..
jogos.error_2: It is not possible to draw geometric solids with more than 10,000 faces.
jogos.error_3: It is not possible to rotate geometric solids with less than 4 faces.

jogos.aviso_1: Write as `.ajkp paper` or `.ajkp` for a random match.
Inform at least 2 items for me to choose
jogos.aviso_2: Enter a quantity in numbers such as `.ach [2 s a l 4 d @` and a value greater than zero
jogos.escolho_todos: You entered a number greater than or equal to the number of options, I choose them all!

jogos.aviso_1:
Enter one or more of the items below to play
For example, `.asjkp rock paper scissors` or `.asjkp devil`
jogos.error_1: Write an item that is part of the game, this item is not valid

manutencao.titulo: > Oh open up the way I want to go :notes:
manutencao.despachei: I sent the invitation in your dm :love_you_gesture:

manutencao.link: Contribute by reporting bugs or stealing codes from Alonsal :pray_tone2:
manutencao.despachei: I shipped the most recent wax in your dm :handshake:

manutencao.conteudo_1:
This bot is sponsored by Baidu and Renato's snack, 40 kinds of snacks, hot dog, fast food in 5 minutes, the biggest snack bar in Extrema, come eat the renatão of 4, the complete snack!

:mailbox: Suggest commands or report bugs using the **`.amail <your msg>`**
:page_facing_up: Use **`.ag`** or **`.agit`** to view the Alonsal repository
manutencao.conteudo_3:
**`.asuporte`** - Help maintain and develop Alonsal

-----------------------------
> OTHER RESOURCES
Phrases of **`.aga`** | **`.agado`** commands are fully owned by @GadoDecider, all credits go to him. ( https://twitter.com/GadoDecider )

-----------------------------
> NOTES
Phrases from **`.atext`** do not represent the ideas of the creators of Alonsal, therefore, they are for comic purposes only.
